item.title: How-To: Rooting a Motorola Droid 3 with the One Click Method
item.dc:creator: robwillisinfo
item.category: How-To: Rooting a Motorola Droid 3 with the One Click Method
item.description:
Rooting your Droid 3: Follow these simple instructions to gain root access on your Droid 3. This does not wipe the phone or any data. Your simply gaining root access on the stock rom. This is a required step for installing custom ROMs. Having root will also enable you to use applications from the market […]

The post How-To: Rooting a Motorola Droid 3 with the One Click Method first appeared on RobWillis.info.
